channel.title: Game-Making on JBoeTech
channel.description: Recent content in Game-Making on JBoeTech

item.title: Game Idea - Car/Vampire Survivor like
item.description:
Top Down car drivingt game with endless waves of diverse enemies.

Features:

  1. Top Down View
  2. Car driving that is fluid and realistic
  3. weapon/ammo/powerup/fuel/health/armor/other pickups
  4. build variation

Weapon ideas:

  1. Glaive
  2. Mortar
  3. Machine gun
  4. sentry
  5. missiles
  6. electric armor

!
